channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Unexpected Trouble in the ‘Ghost Gun’ Case
item.description: Three of the conservative justices might side with the ATF in a case that shouldn’t be close.

item.title: Kamala Harris’s Main Priority Is Expanding Welfare, Not Strengthening the Middle Class
item.description: Harris’s agenda: big new welfare checks for nonworkers and inevitably higher taxes for everyone else who has to pick up the tab.

item.title: Federal judge to hear more evidence on whether to reopen voter registration in Georgia
item.description: At least for now, a federal judge won't order the state of Georgia to reopen voter registration for November's elections.

item.title: NYC Official Demands State Revoke Medical License Of ‘Covid Czar’ Who Held Sex Parties During Pandemic
item.description: A New York City lawmaker is demanding state health officials strip Dr. Jay Varma of his medical license because of his pandemic sex parties.

item.title: Hurricanes Haunt Harris’s Campaign in Final Stretch
item.description: A poorly handled hurricane can cripple a politician. Just ask George W. Bush.

item.title: Arizona DNC campaign office hit by third shooting
item.description: A Democratic National Committee campaign office in suburban Phoenix has been struck in a third shooting in recent weeks, police said Wednesday.

item.title: Kamala as LBJ, Not FDR
item.description: Experimentation without accountability, and laws like chocolate-chip cookies.

item.title: Here’s How The Media Are Lying Right Now: Hurricane Helene Victim-Blaming Edition
item.description: The national media are repeating the Biden administration's lies to cover up its slow and inept response to Hurricane Helene.

item.title: In Calling For Axing The Electoral College, Tim Walz Tells Swing State Voters To Get Lost
item.description: Democrats loathe the Electoral College because it deprives them of the unbridled power to silence their opposition.

item.title: Harris And Biden Don’t Value American Lives, So Neither Should Be President
item.description: Government-sanctioned disregard for life should trouble us all.

item.title: Judicial Bureaucrats Can’t Defy Congress
item.description: They should come to their senses and stop interfering with how Congress wants cases assigned in district courts.

item.title: Political storm: Back-to-back hurricanes rock Harris-Trump presidential campaign
item.description: The back-to-back hurricanes that slammed into the southeast make a major impact on the Harris-Trump presidential race

item.title: Outside Conservative Groups Are Leading Trump’s Ground Game. That Might Be A Good Thing
item.description: 'This is one team at the end of the day. If we’re not all doing our part to win, we will keep losing,' said Sentinel's Jessica Anderson.
